snippet: The aid organizations said the new permit requirements were an effort by the Hamas-led government to collect information that is none of its business.
lead_paragraph: The aid organizations said the new permit requirements were an effort by the Hamas-led government to collect information that is none of its business.

headline.seo: Foreign Agencies in Gaza Protest New Exit Permit Rules
headline.main: Aid Agencies in Gaza Protest New Exit Rules
headline.print_headline: Aid Agencies In Gaza Protest New Exit Rules
